description:
Conquer wet weather cycling with the Summit NeoShell WRX glove. Featuring waterproof Polartec® NeoShell® on the back of the hands, these gloves keep you dry and warm while maintaining breathability. With water-resistant Ax Suede™ Slim Fleece palms for excellent bar feel and touchscreen compatibility, these gloves are your essential companion for wet weather riding.

  • Constructed with waterproof Polartec® NeoShell® fabric on the back of the hands
  • Water-resistant Ax Suede™ Slim Fleece palms with a cozy brushed fleece lining
  • Oversized hook and loop cuff blocks out the cold
  • Smartphone compatible on forefingers and thumbs
name: Pearl Izumi Summit WRX Neoshell Gloves - Men's
